author: Reuters Editorial
title: OSI Systems Q3 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.86
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - OSI Systems Inc:
* OSI SYSTEMS REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.86
* Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q3 REVENUE $267.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $263.2 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 SALES $1.065 BILLION TO $1.095 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.50 TO $3.69
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.84 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.54, REVENUE VIEW $1.06 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, COMPANY’S BACKLOG WAS ABOUT $938 MILLION, COMPARED WITH $738 MILLION AS OF JUNE 30, 2017 Source text for Eikon:
